overview: MCP Proxy - Hierarchical tool organization system. Use get_tools_in_category to explore available categories and execute_tool to run tools.

categories.coding_tools: Development tools including semantic code analysis, file operations, and testing utilities
categories.web_tools: Web scraping, browser automation, and HTTP clients

get_tools_in_category.description: Navigate the tool hierarchy and discover available tools in a category. Returns categories, subcategories, and tools at the specified path.

path.description: Category path using dot notation (e.g., 'coding_tools' or 'coding_tools.serena.search'). Use empty string or '/' for root.

execute_tool.description: Execute a tool by its full path. Automatically proxies the request to the appropriate MCP server.

tool_path.description: Full tool path using dot notation (e.g., 'coding_tools.serena.search.search_symbol') or just tool name if unique

arguments.description: Arguments to pass to the tool
